documents.document: @jamesshields51 @itvfootball 👌⚽️
@ajdrecruit @itvfootball I’m happy to see England do well. It’s nice to not have the ‘usual suspects’ in the final four. 👌
@ladystardust31 @itvfootball 👌
@rustyc10 @itvfootball I enjoy their random chats. Keown is the worst summariser this year and Ally the best for me. ⚽️

Can I just say, Ally McCoist and Jon Champion are an excellent commentary pairing on @itvfootball #worldcup ⚽️ Really enjoying their banter and they are very knowledgable. Other commentators should take direction from these two. 👌
Congratulations England on reaching the #worldcup semi finals. ⚽️ https://t.co/LVik7nXBt0
